I am visually impaired, Widow, a mother of three children and the Deputy Minister of
Public Works from 11th May 2009 under the auspices of the new President of South Africa
Mr. JACOB ZUMA.
After the swearing in ceremony of 1999 making me the chairperson of Parliamentary Joint
Monitoring Committee, a lot of government contracts were awarded to my late husband
with my influence, this actually paved way to our success, my late husband died while he
was on an official trip to Trinidad and Tobago in 2004.you can view my profile at the
Government website www.gov.za click on, Contact Information, then click on Deputy
Ministries, and click on public works, click on my name Ms Hendrietta Ipeleng Bogopane-
Zulu and read about me.
After his death, I discovered that he had some funds in a dollar account which amounted
to the sum of US$30.5M with a security and finance institution here in South Africa of
which I will divulge information to you when I get your full consent and support to go for a
change of beneficiary and subsequent transfer of the funds into your comfortable and
conducive account of your choice.
I will see to it that the account is not traced from South Africa. As soon as you have
confirmed the fund into your account, I will send my eldest son with my Attorney to come
to your country to discuss on business investments. For your assistance, I am offering
you 20% of the principal sum which amounts to US$6,100.000.00 (Six million One Hundred
Thousand United States Dollars Only) However, you have to assure me and also be ready
to go into agreement with me that you will not elope with my fund. If you agree to my
terms, kindly as a matter of urgency send me an email.
Due to my sensitive position in the
South African Government. You Reserve the right to decline the offer ,if found not
comfortable with your principle as BEING QUA BEING.


PLEASE DO NOT CALL ON THE OFFICE LINE, BECAUSE OF THE SENSITIVITY OF THIS
TRANSACTION EXCEPT OF THE ABOVE DIRECT LINE.
I prefer you send me email than call. All correspondence must be by email to any of my
private e-mail addresses: hendzupwx.zu@gmail.com
Thanks for your anticipated co-operation and my regards to your family.
Yours
Faithfully,
MRS. HENDRIETTA ZULU
Deputy Minister Of Public Works
Republic Of south Africa
TEL: +27-71-338-520

Hello,
Firstly, let me start by introducing my self as MRS. HENDRIETTA IPELENG BOGOPANEZULU, I am visually impaired, Widow, a mother of three children and the Deputy Minister of Public Works from 11th May 2009 under the auspices of the new President of South Africa Mr. JACOB ZUMA.
After the swearing in ceremony of 1999 making me the chairperson of Parliamentary Joint Monitoring Committee, a lot of government contracts were awarded to my late husband with my influence, this actually paved way to our success, my late husband died while he was on an official trip to Trinidad and Tobago in 2004.you can view my profile at the Government website www.gov.za click on, Contact Information, then click on Deputy Ministries, and click on public works, click on my name Ms Hendrietta Ipeleng Bogopane- Zulu and read about me.
After his death, I discovered that he had some funds in a dollar account which amounted to the sum of US$30.5M with a security and finance institution here in South Africa of which I will divulge information to you when I get your full consent and support to go for a change of beneficiary and subsequent transfer of the funds into your comfortable and conducive account of your choice.
I will see to it that the account is not traced from South Africa. As soon as you have confirmed the fund into your account, I will send my eldest son with my Attorney to come to your country to discuss on business investments. For your assistance, I am offering you 20% of the principal sum which amounts to US$6,100.000.00 (Six million One Hundred Thousand United States Dollars Only) However, you have to assure me and also be ready to go into agreement with me that you will not elope with my fund. If you agree to my terms, kindly as a matter of urgency send me an email.
Due to my sensitive position in the South African Government. You Reserve the right to decline the offer ,if found not comfortable with your principle as BEING QUA BEING.

We didn't know what BEING QUA BEING was, either. Specifically the QUA.
QUA is Latin, it seems to mean with respect to, or so far as, or in the aspect of. Or maybe 'in the sense of'. Don't take Scamorama's word for it. Anyway, we seem to have a philosophical scammer on our hands, or a scammer who cribs from web pages about philosophy. And now back to our scambait.

PLEASE DO NOT CALL ON THE OFFICE LINE, BECAUSE OF THE SENSITIVITY OF THIS TRANSACTION EXCEPT OF THE ABOVE DIRECT LINE.
I prefer you send me email than call. All correspondence must be by email to any of my private e-mail addresses: hendzupwx.zu@gmail.com
Thanks for your anticipated co-operation and my regards to your family.
Yours
Faithfully,
MRS. HENDRIETTA ZULU
Deputy Minister Of Public Works
Republic Of south Africa
TEL: +27-71-338-520

messages.body:
Dear Hendrietta


Thank you for sending me your passport. Recent legislation in Australia forbids the scanning and emailing of passports. However it doesn't stop me sending you a scan of my driving licence, which is attached. The transaction will be safe in my hands until you are in a position to reclaim it. I am looking forward to the prospect of hosting your son over here. Do you have a photo of him?


As I said in my last email I am more than happy, capable and trustworthy enough to handle your business with the utmost discretion. I thank you that you have chosen me to handle this delicate matter and know that we will both benefit greatly from the mutual understanding and cooperation that our endeavours will bring us. Once you transfer the funds to me, they will stay in an account untouched until your son comes here to conduct his side of the business.


Butkrak Enterprises are in the garment making business. We mass produce and supply clothing, mostly for political campaigns. One of our recent successful products was a range of red shirts that sold in their millions in Thailand. A few years ago we struggled to keep up with the demand for our "Yes We Can" range. At the moment our most popular line is the "Julia Gillard is a ratbag" t-shirt.

 
Please do explain more about the transaction. As you said in your last email, I prefer you send email rather than call. I prefer that too. My mobile phone is attended to by my secretary at all times on my behalf. I don't want her getting wind of this or she'll want a cut. So as you said, email is the better option.
 
Sincerely
Harry Butkrak
Butkrak Enterprises

messages.body:
Dear Hendrietta

 
I have emailed Mr Smith at the bank with the form he supplied. I am at the moment on business in northern Thailand, Khon Kaen to be exact. I will be back in Australia mid week. I will let you know when I hear back from Mr Smith. As you are planning to come to Australia as soon as the funds clear and I transfer some back to you, I assume you are also arranging a visa. If you arrive in Australia without one, they won't let you in. We have very strict border controls. Good wishes to you and your family.

messages.body:
Dear Hendrietta


I am certain we can find a lucrative property contract for you to invest in over here. At the moment Australia is in election mode. One issue that is taking centre stage by all sides is how to cope with the increasing number of boats arriving uninvited. The Liberals (right wing ragamuffins) want to reopen the offshore processing centre in Nauru. The Labor Party (left wing layabouts) want to build a new one in East Timor. Whatever the outcome of the election, there will be a lot of money to be made from investing in Nissan huts and Portakabins. I think this may be the way forward.


If this does not suit you then there is always the proposed upgrade to the Sydney Opera House, also another contentious election issue. You may be familiar with the building, a large performing arts centre on the harbour that resembles white sails on a boat. The plan is to locate a theme park in the land around it, with the world's largest rollercoaster. The tracks of the rollercoaster will run up and down and across the sails. The contentious issue is that the darlings of the opera world will have their performances interrupted every 3-4 minutes by the screams of the theme park riders above. Investors are being called for soon.


You say you are "not good in business". I am sure you must be, to rise to the position of Deputy Minister of Public Works in your government. They would not give that job to just anyone. Plus you have the experience of all the committees and councils you work on. I am pleased to hear you have been to the embassy to get your visa processed. Are you planning to announce your resignation from parliament and departure from South Africa or are you just going to leave without telling anyone? What will the people of the Tshwane East Branch have to say about that. Very daring of you!

 
As soon as I hear from Mr Smith that the transfer has gone though I will arrange to send you what you require for you know what. All my best to you and your family.
 
Sincerely
Harry Butkrak
Butkrak Enterprises

Dear Hendrietta


Now that's better isn't it, back to your old self again. I am not afraid to help you or afraid of losing money or getting it back. That is nothing that I am concerned about. My only concern was about the professionalism and attitude of  and that your best interests were being attended to. Unfortunately we come across many bankers in our lives and we have to grin and bear it. Robert Smith claims to have been in the business for 19 years. Confidentially, between you and me, I don't know how he lasted that long or rose to his current position. Someone in his job needs to pay attention to the details and he has missed on that score. Despite their rudimentary telephone system I have 21st century technology and am in constant contact via the internet. So when the bank account details come through to me I will be able to deal with them immediately.

messages.raw:
HARRY BUTKRAK

A master class in scambaiting. Let the 'small boy' think the 'closer' has cut him out. Of course this only works if the closer is elsewhere - sometimes the scammer 'team members' never meet. Sometimes they are one and the same, which makes this funny in a different way.

Dear Mrs Zulu

I am doing some wonderful business in Thailand this week, but without the use of my voice my PA is having to do most of the work for me. Unfortunately she has a broad accent and sounds like Lindy Chamberlain whingeing away at the base of Ayers Rock. But she assures me that a dingo never made off with her new born.

I have just written yet again to Mr Smith to find out what is going on. There has been no contact from him for 7 days now and I am worried that he has pocketed the $8,100 for himself and we will never hear from him again. But I live in hope that he is actually a decent man and would not do such a thing to you. Please let me know if you have heard from him. Have you got your visa yet? What plans have you made for booking a flight to Sydney?

messages.body:
Attn: Harry Butkrak ,


We have via through our standard bank central system no transfer from your bank in Australia to us,


sorry, i tried to contact you via phone i can not, call me if you still need my help.


Thank you.


REGARDS.

 
Mr.Robert Smith
messages.raw:
ROBERT SMITH

Attn: Harry Butkrak ,

We have via through our standard bank central system no transfer from your bank in Australia to us,

sorry, i tried to contact you via phone i can not, call me if you still need my help.

Thank you.

REGARDS.

Mr.Robert Smith

messages.body:
Dear Mr Smith

The reason you could not contact on the phone is because, as I informed you, I am in Thailand again this week. If you would actually read my communication you would be aware of this.

 
I am not sure I understand the implications of your statement 'call me if you still need my help.' Are you no longer representing Mrs Zulu with this transaction? Why would I need your help? All I require of you is to get your bank, Citibank, the local office of the US department of domestic legislation enforced internationally to do some work rather than sit back and expect money to fall in to your lap. What exactly has Standard Bank done to trace this transaction? I informed you that my bank says the money has been paid. What have you done to verify or trace this? There we go, a number of questions. Will they ever be answered?
 
Sincerely
Harry Butkrak
Butkrak Enterprises




 





scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
